channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2021 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.PUB for .NET 21.9 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PUB for .NET 21.9. Aspose.PUB for .NET is a —Åonvenient library that provides the feature to convert Microsoft Publisher documents. The library is in compliance with the .NET 5.0 and also supports .NET Standard 2.1 and .NET Framework 4.0. You can use it for application development in any IDE that targets the .NET platform. Improvements and Changes EULA urls have been fixed Product logos have been updated The installation package has been renewed

item.title: Aspose.PUB for .NET 21.6 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PUB for .NET 21.6. Major Improvement Aspose.PUB for .NET provides PUB to PDF conversion. Publisher 2000 format support has been added. .NET 5.0 target framework support has been added. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category PUBNET-206 Provide support of .NET framework 5.0 New Feature PUBNET-207 .NET Core and .NET 5 Support New Feature PUBNET-220 Add support for Publisher 2000 New Feature

item.title: Aspose.PUB for .NET 21.4 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PUB for .NET 21.4. Major Improvement Aspose.PUB for .NET provides PUB to PDF conversion. SHA-256 license type has been supported. Support for .NET Standard 2.1 target framework has been added. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category PUBNET-234 .NET Standard Support New Feature PUBNET-219 Support SHA-256 Licenses Enhancement
